de.bitbrain.braingdx.audio

Class AudioManagerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.bitbrain.braingdx.audio.AudioManagerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AudioManager

    public class AudioManagerImpl
extends Object
implements AudioManager
    This audio manager implementation provides utility methods to fade between different music and sounds.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Miguel Gonzalez Sanchez

    • Method Detail

      • spawnSound

        public void spawnSound(String path,
              float x,
              float y,
              float pitch,
              float volume,
              float hearingRange)
        Description copied from interface: AudioManager
        plays a sound in the GameWorld relative to the GameCamera.
        Specified by:
        spawnSound in interface AudioManager
        Parameters:
        path - the path of the audio file
        x - the horizontal position in the world
        y - the vertical position in the world
        pitch - the audio pitch
        volume - the audio volume. FinalVolume=MasterVolume*volume*directionalVolume
        hearingRange - the hearing range where the audio is hearable from

      • spawnSoundLooped

        public void spawnSoundLooped(String path,
                    float x,
                    float y,
                    float pitch,
                    float volume,
                    float hearingRange)
        Description copied from interface: AudioManager
        Spawns a Sound in the GameWorld relative to the GameCamera. The sound object is removed as soon the sound has stopped playing.
        Specified by:
        spawnSoundLooped in interface AudioManager
        Parameters:
        path - the path of the audio file
        x - the horizontal position in the world
        y - the vertical position in the world
        pitch - the audio pitch
        volume - the audio volume. FinalVolume=MasterVolume*volume*directionalVolume
        hearingRange - the hearing range where the audio is hearable from

      • spawnSoundLooped

        public void spawnSoundLooped(String path,
                    GameObject target,
                    float pitch,
                    float volume,
                    float hearingRange)
        Description copied from interface: AudioManager
        Spawns a Sound in the GameWorld relative to the GameCamera. The sound object is removed as soon the sound has stopped playing.
        Specified by:
        spawnSoundLooped in interface AudioManager
        Parameters:
        path - the path of the audio file
        target - the target to attach the sound to
        pitch - the audio pitch
        volume - the audio volume. FinalVolume=MasterVolume*volume*directionalVolume
        hearingRange - the hearing range where the audio is hearable from

      • spawnMusic

        public void spawnMusic(String path,
              float x,
              float y,
              float volume,
              float hearingRange)
        Description copied from interface: AudioManager
        Spawns a Music in the world. The music persists until it is deleted via clearMusic.
        Specified by:
        spawnMusic in interface AudioManager
        Parameters:
        path - the path of the audio file
        x - the horizontal position in the world
        y - the vertical position in the world
        volume - the audio volume. FinalVolume=MasterVolume*volume*directionalVolume
        hearingRange - the hearing range where the audio is hearable from
